backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no functionality; backend has no data storage as all content is static.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting implemented features including hero section updates, mission section, course structure breakdown, application process, and management team page with high confidence mappings to source files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files describing routing, pages, components, styling with rose-gold bridal theme, and new management/admin features.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes using neutral grayscale palette for background, foreground, and UI elements.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with meta description highlighting 6 months free beautician course with ISO certification across Tamil Nadu.
frontend/src/App.tsx: TanStack Router configuration defining routes for Home, Terms, Privacy, Refund, Accessibility, Contact, ManagementTeam, and Admin pages wrapped in Layout component.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component with brand info, quick links, legal links, contact details (phone 9384459938), social media icons, and Caffeine.ai attribution with UTM tracking.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Layout wrapper providing Navigation header and Footer around page content via TanStack Router Outlet.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Responsive navigation header with logo, menu links (including Management Team), mobile sheet menu, smooth scroll to sections, and WhatsApp/phone call-to-action button.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook managing Internet Identity authentication and creating backend actor instances with automatic query invalidation on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating no backend data storage functionality; all content is static and rendered directly in components.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom rose gold and bridal elegance color system using OKLCH color space, including light/dark theme variables and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and renders the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AccessibilityStatemen: Static page displaying Nila Bridal Academy's accessibility commitment, efforts, and contact information for assistance requests.
frontend/src/pages/Admin.tsx: PIN-protected admin dashboard (PIN: 'NILA') with tabs for managing students, courses, certificates, and settings; displays placeholder content after authentication.
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: Contact page displaying phone number (9384459938), WhatsApp link, service area (Tamil Nadu), and booking information with call-to-action buttons.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Main landing page showcasing Nila Bridal Academy's free 6-month beautician course, bridal makeup services, course structure, enrollment steps, and testimonials with hero section and multiple content cards.
frontend/src/pages/ManagementTeam.tsx: Displays the leadership team page with four team member cards (Founder, Academic Head, Senior Trainer, Student Coordinator) showing profile images, titles, and descriptions, plus contact information.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicy.tsx: Renders the privacy policy page explaining data collection, usage for appointment/registration management, and commitment to not sharing information with third parties.
frontend/src/pages/RefundPolicy.tsx: Shows refund policy page clarifying that training programs are free, bridal makeup advance payments are non-refundable, and rescheduling is allowed based on availability.
frontend/src/pages/TermsConditions.tsx: Displays terms and conditions page listing service terms including free 6-month course, ISO certification requirements, attendance rules, booking policies, and completion requirements.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color scheme with rose-gold theme, OKLCH color system, custom fonts (Inter, Playfair Display), border radius variables, and animation keyframes for accordions.
project_state.json: Project state file documenting the Nila Bridal Academy website architecture, features, image requirements, and technical notes including free 6-month ISO-certified course, bridal services, and PIN-protected admin panel.
